pyramids.io package¶

Submodules¶

pyramids.io.fdf module¶

This module include the tdapOption class, which is initializied by reading the input.fdf file, to get the useful setups, such as the system label, time step of electronic and ionic motions, spin status, for the following data process.

class pyramids.io.fdf.tdapOptions(inputFile='input.fdf')[source]¶

Bases: object

output()[source]¶

Print the obtained values for check and test

readFdf(inputFile='input.fdf')[source]¶

Read the fdf file input.fdf. The tags, including both one-line tags and block tags, are parsed by a dictonary, of which the keys are the tags and the values are a string of the input value.

pyramids.io.result module¶

Created on Mon Jul 25 20:28:55 2016 The collection of the useful methods used in the TDAP results analysis

pyramids.io.result.getBands(bandType='e')[source]¶

return the bands read from systemLabel.bands as the dimension numKpoint x numBand x numSpin returns: X, Ek, xticks, xticklabels

pyramids.io.result.getBerry(step='')[source]¶

return the Eigenvalues read from systemLabel.EIG

pyramids.io.result.getDOS(filename='siesta.dos')[source]¶

return the Temperature, KS Energy and Total Energy as the dimension of Nstep read from systemLabel.MDE returns the Temperature, KS Energy, Total Energy, Volume, Pressure
